```{r}
# Group the data by month and sum the sales for each month
UMOJADaily <- UMOJA %>%
  mutate(Day = floor_date(Day, "day")) %>%
  group_by(Day) %>%
  summarize(Sales = sum(Sum.of.Total.Sales)) 

# create xts time series object
UMOJADailyts <- xts(UMOJADaily$Sales, order.by = UMOJADaily$Day)


PlotUMOJA <- dygraph(UMOJADailyts)%>%
  dyHighlight(highlightCircleSize = 5, 
              highlightSeriesOpts = list(strokeWidth = 3)) %>%
  dyOptions(colors = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(8, "Dark2")) %>%
  dyLegend(show = "always") 
PlotUMOJA
```




```{r}
# Group the data by month and sum the sales for each month
UMOJADept <- UMOJA %>%
  mutate(Day = floor_date(Day, "day")) %>%
  group_by(Day, Department) %>%
  summarize(Sales = sum(Sum.of.Total.Sales)) 

# Reshape the data from long to wide format
UMOJADept <- dcast(UMOJADept, Department  ~  Day, value.var = "Sales") %>% select(1,29,28,27,26,25,24,23,22,21,20,19,18,17) %>% arrange(desc(`2023-06-18`))
# Format the salary column as custom accounting values

UMOJADept$`2023-06-18` <- format(UMOJADept$`2023-06-18`, big.mark = ",", decimal.mark = ".", nsmall = 0)
```
